data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Moravskoslezský, Czechia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Moravskoslezský, Czechia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Moravskoslezský, Czechia to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 8,846 believers in the state of Moravskoslezský the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 8,846 believers in Moravskoslezský, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jew, Czech-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, Czech-speaking people know you.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Moravskoslezský to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 8,846 believers in Moravskoslezský, Czechia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Moravskoslezský.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
